name: Manifesto
description: Ignite is a movement. A revolution of resounding hope and unbridled love. That’s why a portion of the proceeds (outside of production and manufacturing) from this shirt and all Ignite Apparel products go strait to an organization or cause that you believe is changing the world. This cause is brought to our attention by you and voted on by popular demand at www.igniteapparel.com each month. Every month we give you a new chance to raise your voice and awareness of a cause you think needs to be heard and supported. Thank you so much for giving us a shot. Every order is shipped out with a few suprises. So be ready for those! Thanks again guys. Spread the flame. [All Ignite Apparel Shirts are Printed on Super-Soft Sweatshop Free Premium American Apparel T-Shirts]
